p: The statistical analysis was conducted by the Statistical Program for Social Sciences (SPSS; Chicago, IL) version 13.0 for Windows. All the data were expressed as mean values ± standard deviation ( n = 3). Statistical significance between groups was assessed by using one-way analysis of variance followed by the LSD test in the condition of variance homogeneity and Dunnett's T3 test in the condition of variance heterogeneity. Differences were considered significant at p < 0.05.
